description:
Disney fans often take the time to revisit the studio’s classic movies, no matter how well-known or obscure. It’s become especially easy to do so with the addition of Disney Plus. Nevertheless, some viewers have been outright stunned by a classic Disney movie which features a rather inappropriate scene. The scene occurs during the movie [...]

The post Inappropriate Scene From Classic Movie On Disney Plus Has Viewers In Disbelief appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Inappropriate Scene From Classic Movie On Disney Plus Has Viewers In Disbelief
